Posts.Content: hi ruthy i also have just had the test done for the same reasons as u i also have a son and i will do anything to protect him as u do for youre kids! ive just been given the all clear from breast cancer just got to have the radiotherapy and then yearly mammograms! i had the test because my sister also had breast cancer when she was 35 but she didnt want nto have it done shes not as strong as me! ive got to wait 3 months for the results!xx

Posts.Content: hi lone fox i take tablets called lansoprazole due to havin a sromach ulcer earlier this year i take them to protect my stomach while havin chemo u could speak to ure doctor about it! hope this helpsxx
